K10bsu006_u:2: evaṃ mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahātā bhikṣusaṅghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣusahasraiḥ
K10bsu006_u:3: tadyathā āyuṣmatā cājñātakauṇḍinyena āyuṣmatā ca mahānāmnā āyuṣmatā ca revatena āyuṣmatā
K10bsu006_u:4: ca vakkulena āyuṣmatā ca śāriputreṇa āyuṣmatā ca pūrṇena maitrāyaṇīputreṇa ca śrāvakaniyutaiḥ /
K10bsu006_u:5: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthurdvātriṃśatā bodhisattvasahasraiḥ
K10bsu006_u:6: tadyathā sahacittotpādadharmacakrapravartanena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anikṣiptadhureṇa
K10bsu006_u:7: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena avalokiteśvareṇa
K10bsu006_u:8: ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsthāmaprāptena ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena /
K10bsu006_u:10: te sarve yena bhagavān yena ca jetavanaṃ vihāraṃ tenopasaṅkrāntā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavataḥ puratastasthuḥ /
K10bsu006_u:11: atha khalu bhagavān pūrvāhṇakālasamaye nivāsya pātracīvaramātraḥ śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāviśat /
K10bsu006_u:14: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ śrutamātreṇa pātraṃ cakrikaṃ śikyaṃ bhagavate upanāmayāmāsa /
K10bsu006_u:16: yadā tvaṃ praviśasi piṇḍapātika vimocaye tvaṃ bahavaṃ hi prāṇinām /
K10bsu006_u:17: uttāraye tvaṃ bahavaṃ hi sattvā narakabhayājjātijarāmahābhayā //
K10bsu006_u:19: mahānubhāvo varadakṣiṇīyo vimocayitvā punaraṃ hi āgamī //
K10bsu006_u:20: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavata imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:21: atha bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ nātidūre sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:22: atha te sarve gavākṣatoraṇaniryūhakā hiraṇyamayāḥ sphaṭikamayā rūpyamayāḥ prādurabhūvan /
K10bsu006_u:23: tathā śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ mahāntaṃ janakāyaṃ saṃsthito 'bhūvan /
K10bsu006_u:24: atha sa janakāyaḥ saṃśayajāto babhūva ko hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayaḥ nagarasya śubhanimittaṃ prādurabhūt /
K10bsu006_u:31: tatra śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu006_u:34: atha sa janakāyastaṃ jīrṇakaṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtāñjalirevamāha /
K10bsu006_u:35: yattasya bhagavatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya guṇavarṇasamudīraṇasamaye idaṃ śubhanimittamabhūt /
K10bsu006_u:36: dṛṣṭamātrasya tasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāro bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu006_u:37: atha sa jīrṇakapuruṣastaṃ janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇasamudīraṇatayā gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
K10bsu006_u:38: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe saṃsāraduḥkhā vinimuktu so naro /
K10bsu006_u:39: āpāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate svargaṃ ca so yāsyati śīghramevam //
K10bsu006_u:40: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe dṛḍhapratijño bahukalpakoṭibhiḥ /
K10bsu006_u:42: so bodhisattvo sthita gaṅgavālukān kadāci so gacchati durgatī bhayam /
K10bsu006_u:43: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu yaḥ śruṇe āpāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate //
K10bsu006_u:44: kalpānakoṭīnayutānacintiyā rājā sa bhotī sada cakravartī /
K10bsu006_u:46: yat kiñci pūrvaṃ sada pāpu yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati śīghrametat /
K10bsu006_u:48: sukhāvatīṃ gacchati buddhakṣetraṃ paryaṅkabaddho sa ca bodhisattvo /
K10bsu006_u:50: apāyagāmī na kadāci bheṣyate yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhārayet /
K10bsu006_u:51: atha sa jīrṇakaḥ purūṣo janakāyaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:52: atha bhagavān pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastīṃ mahānagarīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhut /
K10bsu006_u:53: tatra ca nagaradvāre dvādaśakoṭyaḥ padmānāṃ prādurabhūvan /
K10bsu006_u:54: teṣu ca padmeṣu dvādaśakoṭyo bodhisattvānāṃ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ (Asv 107)
K10bsu006_u:56: atha bhagavataḥ praviṣṭamātreṇa śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ navanavatikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi
K10bsu006_u:59: atha bhagavān ānandena saha nagaravalambikāyā dārikāya gṛhe samāgato 'bhūta /
K10bsu006_u:60: atha bhagavān nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe cakrikaṃ kaṭakaṭāpayāmāsa /
K10bsu006_u:61: atha sā dārikā taṃ cakrīśabdaṃ śrutvā saṃśayajātābhūt /
K10bsu006_u:63: mama gṛhe na kadācit piṇḍapātika āgato 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:64: atha sa nagaravalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī paridevantī sthitābhūt tīkṣṇadhāramasiṃ gaveṣantī paridevantī rudantī sthitābhūt /
K10bsu006_u:65: atha sā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā paridevantī aśrukaṇṭhī rudantī gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
K10bsu006_u:66: aho bata duḥkhu daridrake gṛhe varaṃ mama maraṇu na cāpi jīvitam /
K10bsu006_u:67: kiṃ cāpi me kāryuṣu jīvitena yadyaivāhaṃ duḥkhu śarīra pīḍitam //
K10bsu006_u:69: anāthabhūtā ahamadyameva yadyaivāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe // (Asv 108)
K10bsu006_u:70: atha sa nagaravalambikā dārikā śūnyākāragṛhe niṣaṇṇā imā gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthitābhūt /
K10bsu006_u:73: anekaduṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasracīrṇacaritaḥ sa śākyamunistathāgato nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhe sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:74: atha śuddhavāsakāyiko devaputraḥ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ
K10bsu006_u:75: gṛhītvā kāśikāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā yena nagaravalambikāyā dārikāyā gṛhaṃ tenopasaṅkrānto 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:77: prāvara dārike imāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi imānyanekaśatasahasramūlyānyābharaṇāni /
K10bsu006_u:78: prāvṛtya cedaṃ śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā imaṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantamupanāmaya /
K10bsu006_u:79: atha sā dārikā tāni kāśikāni vastrāṇi prāvṛtya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā taṃ śatarasabhojanapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntā
K10bsu006_u:82: pariṇāmaya tvaṃ dārike yathā pariṇāmitaṃ vipaśyiśikhiviśvabhūkkakutasundakanakamunikāśyapaprabhṛtibhiḥ sadbhistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksambuddhaiḥ
K10bsu006_u:84: atha sā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā (Asv 109)
K10bsu006_u:86: anena piṇḍapātakuśalamūlena mā kaśmiṃścid daridragṛhe upapadyeya /
K10bsu006_u:87: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ pariṇāmayitvā bhagavate dattvā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā /
K10bsu006_u:92: atha sā dārikā pratinivṛtya sarvāṅgapraṇipātena bhagavantaṃ prapatitā /
K10bsu006_u:93: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
K10bsu006_u:94: avaśyaṃ me pūrvakṛtena karmaṇā yenāhaṃ jāta daridrake gṛhe /
K10bsu006_u:95: karohi kāruṇya mamaṃ hi duḥkhita vinivartayasva narakā hi pālān //
K10bsu006_u:96: karohi kāruṇya mama duḥkhitāyā istribhāvā upapannu nāyaka /
K10bsu006_u:97: tvaṃ lokanātha jaravyādhiśoka vimocaye maṃ mama duḥkhitāyāḥ //
K10bsu006_u:98: trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ vimocayāhī mama duḥkhitāyāḥ /
K10bsu006_u:99: kṛtaṃ hi nātha praṇidhiṃ tvayā hi ye keci sattvā iha jambudvīpe // (Asv 110)
K10bsu006_u:100: tiṣṭhanti ye vai daśasu diśāsu sattvā hi sarve sukhitā kariṣye /
K10bsu006_u:101: sarve ca haṃ mocayi duḥkhasāgarāt trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam //
K10bsu006_u:102: tvayaṃ hi nātha mayi mocayī jagat avaśyaṃ me pūrvakṛtena karmaṇā /
K10bsu006_u:103: yenāhaṃ jātu daridrake gṛhe trāṇaṃ bhavāhī mama duḥkhitāyāḥ //
K10bsu006_u:104: bhavaṃ tu nātha jaravyādhimocakaṃ trāṇaṃ bhavāhī guṇa sañcitāgra /
K10bsu006_u:105: na cā kariṣye punareva pāpaṃ yadvedayāmī imi vedanāni //
K10bsu006_u:106: kṛpaṃ jani...............magra sattvā trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam /
K10bsu006_u:107: ye keci sattvā iha jambudvīpe nāmaṃ ca vai dhāraya paśca kāle //
K10bsu006_u:109: yatakiñci pāpaṃ tadapūrva yat kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ kṣayaṃ yāsyati śīghrametat //
K10bsu006_u:110: atha sā nagaravalambikā dārikā bhagavantaṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā punarapi gṛhagamanamārabdhā /
K10bsu006_u:113: pratinivartasva dārike pūrvajātinidānaṃ samanusmarāmi tadahaṃ parikīrtayiṣyāmi /
K10bsu006_u:115: parikīrtaya lokavināyakādya yadyat kṛtaṃ pāpa sadā sudāruṇam /
K10bsu006_u:116: avaśya me pāpu kṛtaṃ sudāruṇaṃ yenāhaṃ jātu daridrake gṛhe //
K10bsu006_u:117: tvaṃ sārthavāhu iha sarvaloke vimocaye mam iha istribhāvā /
K10bsu006_u:118: trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ kṛtajñahaṃ nitya bhavāmi nāyake //
K10bsu006_u:119: saṃśrāvaye mam imu dharmanetrī nāsau kadācittajate apāyam /
K10bsu006_u:120: saṃśodhayī karma yathākṛtaṃ mayā trāṇaṃ bhavāhī śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇam //
K10bsu006_u:121: asaṅgajñānī varalokanāyaka vandāmi nātha śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjalī //
K10bsu006_u:123: bhūtapūrvo dārike atīte 'dhvani asaṅkhyeyaiḥ kalpai ratnaśikhī nāma tathāgato 'rhan
K10bsu006_u:125: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu006_u:126: tena (Asv 112) khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatī nāma rājadhānyabhūt /
K10bsu006_u:127: tena khalu punaḥ samayena padmāvatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ padmaprabho nāma gṛhapatirabhūt /
K10bsu006_u:129: tena khalu punaḥ samayena grāmanagaranigamajanapadeṣu piṇḍapātiko bhikṣuḥ piṇḍapātāyāvatarati /
K10bsu006_u:130: yadā tvadgṛhamāgato 'bhūta tadā tvaṃ dārike piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā gṛhānniṣkrāntā punareva praviṣṭā 'bhūḥ /
K10bsu006_u:132: tena karmopacayena tvayā dārike dvādaśakalpasahasrāṇi punaḥ punardaridragṛhe duḥkhānyanubhūtāni /
K10bsu006_u:133: ekena tvayā dārike kuśalamūlena bodhivyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyase /
K10bsu006_u:134: yattvayā tasya bhikṣo rūpaliṅgasaṃsthā na dṛṣṭā bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ dārike anāgate 'dhvani
K10bsu006_u:135: acintyairaparimāṇaiḥ kalpairnagaradhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ
K10bsu006_u:136: sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān loke /
K10bsu006_u:137: atha sā dārikā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvaivamāha /
K10bsu006_u:138: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan mama buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatraivāhaṃ buddho bhaviṣyāmi /
K10bsu006_u:141: yādṛaśī ca sā sukhāvatī lokadhātuḥ tādṛśaṃ tadbuddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu006_u:144: atha ca sā dārikā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā svagṛhagamanamārabdhā /
K10bsu006_u:146: tvaṃ dārike saptame divase kālaṃ kariṣyasi /
K10bsu006_u:150: tasya khalu punā rājño 'jitasenasya putro janiṣyase /
K10bsu006_u:151: eṣa eva tava paścimo garbhavāso bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu006_u:152: atha bhagavān paścimakena nagaradvāreṇa śrāvastyā mahānagaryā niṣkrānto yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:153: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā pādau śirasābhivandya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
K10bsu006_u:155: yadā tvayā āgatu piṇḍapātikā vimocayitvā iha sarvasattvā //
K10bsu006_u:156: sukhena saṃsthāpayi sarvasattvā maitrībalaṃ sarvajagattvayā kṛtam /
K10bsu006_u:157: sa piṇḍapātaṃ varamāṇḍanāyaka vimocitaste jagatī bhayā ca //
K10bsu006_u:158: ye bodhisattvā iha jambudvīpe sarve ca mārgaṃ tava darśayanti /
K10bsu006_u:159: (Asv 114) parinirvṛtasya sada paścakāle dhāretu sūtram imu buddhavarṇitam //
K10bsu006_u:162: athāyuṣmānānanda imā gāthā bhāṣitvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ puratastasthau /
K10bsu006_u:170: ye kecidānanda gaṇḍīśabdaṃ śroṣyanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtyāni parikṣayaṃ yāsyanti /
K10bsu006_u:175: śṛṇu ānanda ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye mama parinirvṛtasya saddharmavipralope
K10bsu006_u:177: ye sattvā vā araṇyāyatane gaṇḍayākoṭanaśabdaṃ śroṣyanti namo buddhāyeti kariṣyanti
K10bsu006_u:181: atha tena gaṇḍīśabdena sarve te mahāśrāvakāḥ sannipatitā abhūvan /
K10bsu006_u:182: yathā yathā āsane niṣaṇṇāḥ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjante sma /
K10bsu006_u:183: atha tatraiva śrāvakamadhye nandimitro nāma mahāśrāvakaḥ sannipatito 'bhūt sanniṣaṇṇaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:185: gaccha tvaṃ nandimitra mahāśrāvaka pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya kalyāṇamitraparicaryāṃ kuru /
K10bsu006_u:191: na te sattvāste śakṣyante bālāgramapi kampayituṃ prāgeva jīvitādvyavaropayitum /
K10bsu006_u:192: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvakaḥ pratyūṣakālasamaye suvarṇavarṇaṃ vastraṃ prāvṛtya yena pūrvasyāndiśi magadhaviṣaye rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenānukrānto 'bhut /
K10bsu006_u:193: atha rājā ajitasenastaṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:198: āgaccha mahāśrāvaka bhikṣo rājā te ājñāpayati /
K10bsu006_u:200: mama rājñā kiṃ kāryaṃ mama rājā kiṃ kariṣyati /
K10bsu006_u:203: na ca sa bhikṣustava pārśve āgacchati /
K10bsu006_u:207: atha sa rājā svakenaivātmabhāvena yena sa nandimitramahāśrāvakastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:209: āgaccha bho bhikṣo mama rājadhānīṃ praviśa /
K10bsu006_u:210: atha rājā ajitaseno dakṣiṇahaste taṃ bhikṣuṃ gṛhītvā svakāṃ rājadhānīṃ praviṣṭo 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:211: atha rājñājitasenena nandimitrasya bhikṣoḥ siṃhāsanaṃ dattamabhut /
K10bsu006_u:212: atha rājājitaseno bhadrapīṭhake niṣadya taṃ nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakamevamāha /
K10bsu006_u:216: ye kecid bhikṣupravrajitāste sarve bhikṣāhārāḥ piṇḍapātamavacarantaḥ paribhuñjanti /
K10bsu006_u:220: yadi te bhikṣo mama svamāṃsena kāryaṃ svamāṃsaṃ dāsyāmi /
K10bsu006_u:222: bhuñjāmi tadbhojanu yad dadāhi mṛṣṭānnapānaṃ rasapānamuktamam /
K10bsu006_u:223: kleśā hi nirmukta tvayā bhaviṣyasi sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābham //
K10bsu006_u:224: sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakasya śraddhāprasādaṃ paramaṃ sudurlabham /
K10bsu006_u:225: ye śāsane pravrajitā ca bhikṣavā sudurlabhaṃ śāsanu nāyakānām //
K10bsu006_u:226: sudurlabhaṃ sugatavarasya darśanaṃ namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāvo /
K10bsu006_u:227: namo 'stu te dharmamayaṃ mahāmune namo 'stu te kleśavicakṣaṇāryam //
K10bsu006_u:228: namo 'stu te sarvajarapramokṣaṇāt namo 'stu te mārganidarśanāryam /
K10bsu006_u:229: namo 'stu te mārgapathasya darśakaṃ namo 'stu te bodhipathasya darśakam //
K10bsu006_u:230: atha nandimitro mahāśrāvako rājānamajitasenaṃ bhagavato guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:231: atha rājānamajitasenaṃ taṃ nandimitro mahāśrāvako gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
K10bsu006_u:232: sudurlabhaṃ bhikṣu tathaiva darśanaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya bhaveya darśanam / (Asv 118)
K10bsu006_u:233: ye bhikṣusaṅghasya dadeya dānaṃ na tasya yakṣā na ca rākṣasāśca //
K10bsu006_u:234: na pretakuṣmāṇḍamahoragāśca vighnaṃ na kurvanti kadāci teṣām /
K10bsu006_u:235: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ sudurlabhaṃ tasya manuṣyalābham //
K10bsu006_u:236: yo durlabhaṃ darśanu bhikṣubhāvaṃ sudurlabhaṃ kalpaśatairacintiyaiḥ /
K10bsu006_u:237: yo lokanāthasya hi nāmu dhāraye kalpāna koṭīnayutānacintiyā //
K10bsu006_u:238: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam /
K10bsu006_u:239: na tasya bhotī vinipātadurgatiṃ yo īdṛśaṃ paśyati bhikṣurājam //
K10bsu006_u:242: yo dāsyate asya hi piṇḍapātaṃ muktā na bheṣyanti jarārtavyādhayā //
K10bsu006_u:243: kleśā vinirmukta sadā tu bheṣyati ye tasya dāsyantiha piṇḍapātam //
K10bsu006_u:244: atha sa rājā ajitaseno nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ guṇavarṇamudīrayitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:247: evamastu mahārāja bhuñje piṇḍapāta tava gṛhe /
K10bsu006_u:248: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ khādanīyena bhojanīyena taṃ nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ santarpayati sma /
K10bsu006_u:250: kiṃ tava mahārāja asmin pṛthivīpradeśe udyānabhūmirasti /
K10bsu006_u:260: atha tatrodyānabhūmau ye udyānaguṇāste sarve santīti /
K10bsu006_u:261: yā graiṣmikyaḥ puṣkariṇyastāḥ śītalajalaparipūrṇā yā vārṣikyastā nātyuṣṇā nātiśītalajalaparipūrṇāḥ /
K10bsu006_u:265: (Asv 120) ye tiryagyonigatāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ śukaśārikācakravākamayūrakokilādayaste nānārutāni kurvanti sma /
K10bsu006_u:266: atha tatraiva udyānabhūmau suvarṇavarṇāḥ suvarṇatuṇḍāḥ suvarṇapakṣāḥ suvarṇapādāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ prādurbhūtāḥ /
K10bsu006_u:268: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako yena rājño 'jitasenasya rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:274: atha nandimitraṃ mahāśrāvakaṃ rājā ajitaseno gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
K10bsu006_u:276: aśokamucilinda tathaiva pāṭalā saugandhikāśca sumanā ca vārṣikā //
K10bsu006_u:277: tadā pāriyātrā nadītīranirmitā suvarṇavarṇā sada pakṣiṇā abhūt /
K10bsu006_u:281: atha nandimitramahāśrāvako rājño 'jitasenasya gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:282: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhante sma /
K10bsu006_u:286: hastirathaṃ ca aśvarathaṃ ca sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
K10bsu006_u:288: atha tā amātyakoṭyo vacanaṃ śrutvā śīghrameva tad hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtavatyaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:289: atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtamātreṇa rājājitaseno yena sodyānabhūmistenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:291: asmin pṛthivīpradeśe mahārāja mama kuṭikaṃ kārayitavyam yatrāhaṃ sanniṣaṇṇastava gṛhe piṇḍapātaṃ paribhokṣyāmi /
K10bsu006_u:301: triṃśadyojanāni dīrgheṇa ṣaḍyojanānyūrdhvāyāṃ saptaratnamayaṃ maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kuṭikaṃ kāraya /
K10bsu006_u:304: maṇimuktisañcchāditaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānamajitasenamevamāha /
K10bsu006_u:307: tatraiva pṛthivīpradeśe caṅkramaḥ kārayitavyaścaturyojanāni dīrgheṇa dve yojane vistāreṇa /
K10bsu006_u:308: atha so 'mātyastaṃ caṅkramaṃ kārayitvā yena rājā ajitasenastenopasaṅkrānto rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
K10bsu006_u:309: kṛtaṃ mayā caṅkramu suṣṭhu śobhanaṃ ājñā tvayā yat kṛtapūrvameva ca /
K10bsu006_u:310: sattvāna moceti prakṛtiṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vimocaye prāṇina sarvametat //
K10bsu006_u:311: aho sulabdhā praṇidhīkṛtaṃ tvayā vimocayī sarvajagat sadevakam /
K10bsu006_u:312: praṇidhiṃ kṛtaṃ yattvayamīdṛśaṃ bhave dharmaṃ prakāśeti me dharmabhāṇako //
K10bsu006_u:313: niṣaṇṇa sthitvā kuṭikā ca caṅkrame ājñā kṛtaṃ yat tvaya yādṛśī kṛtā /
K10bsu006_u:314: sa caṅkramaṃ caiva kṛtaṃ suśobhanaṃ maṇiratnasañcchādita taṃ ca bhūmim //
K10bsu006_u:315: atha rājā ajitaseno yena svakā rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:317: kuṭike niṣaṇṇo vikiraṇaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:318: anyena keśānanyena nayānānyanyena dantānanyena grīvā anyena bāhū anyena hṛdayamanyenodaramanyenorū anyena jaṅghe anyena pādau samāpanno 'bhūt
K10bsu006_u:319: atha sa rājā ajitasenaḥ saptāhasyātyayena taṃ bhikṣuṃ na paśyati /
K10bsu006_u:323: atha sa rājā saputro yena sā kuṭikā tenopasaṅkrānto 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:324: atha sa rājā ajitasenastaṃ bhikṣumātmabhāvaṃ khaṇḍaṃ khaṇḍaṃ kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayajāto 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:325: santrastaromakūpajāto vastrāṇi pāṭyan paridevan rudan aśrukaṇṭhaḥ putramevamāha /
K10bsu006_u:328: atha sa rājakumāraḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvā rājānaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata /
K10bsu006_u:329: mā śokacittasya bhave nṛpendra mā vedayī vedanamīdṛśāni /
K10bsu006_u:330: ātmaghātaṃ karitvā tu niraye tvaṃ gamiṣyasi /
K10bsu006_u:333: na cāyaṃ ghātito yakṣairna bhūtairna ca rākṣasaiḥ /
K10bsu006_u:341: yo nāma tasya dhāreti nāsau gacchati durgatim /
K10bsu006_u:343: atha sa rājakumārastaṃ pitaraṃ gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:345: kathaṃ tvaṃ kumāra jānīṣe yadayaṃ bhikṣuḥ samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:347: paśya mahārāja ayaṃ bhikṣurbodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ sarvakleśavinirmukto bhavasāgarapāraṅgataḥ sarvasattvahitārthaṃ ca mārgaṃ darśayate śubham /
K10bsu006_u:350: atha sa rājā sa ca rājakumāro bahubhirdārakaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yena sa caṅkramastenopasaṅkrāntau /
K10bsu006_u:353: atha rājā taṃ bhikṣū dṛṣṭvā maulipaṭṭaṃ rājakumārasya dadāti /
K10bsu006_u:360: na mama rājyena kāryaṃ na bhogena naiśvaryādhipatyena kāryam /
K10bsu006_u:363: atha rājā yena sa bhikṣustenopasaṅkrāntaḥ prāñjalirevamāha /
K10bsu006_u:366: ye darśanaṃ dāsyati tubhyamārṣā muktā ca so bheṣyati kalpakoṭibhiḥ /
K10bsu006_u:367: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ yo nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇute muhūrtam //
K10bsu006_u:369: niṣadya yugye ratanāmaye śubhe vrajāmyahaṃ yena sa rājadhānīm /
K10bsu006_u:371: sūkṣmāṇi jālāni ca saṃhitāni yāṃ cīvarāṃ tubhya dadāmi adya //
K10bsu006_u:372: atha sa bhikṣū ratnamaye yugye gṛhītvā yena rājadhānī tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:376: ye bhikṣusaṅghāya dadanti dānaṃ te bodhimaṇḍena cireṇa gacchata //
K10bsu006_u:377: sudurlabhaṃ darśana nāyakasya na cireṇa so gacchati buddhakṣetram /
K10bsu006_u:379: atha nandimitramahāśrāvakaḥ ajitasenasya rājño gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:380: atha rājā ajitaseno bherīṃ parāhanti sma /
K10bsu006_u:381: atha tena bherīśabdena sarvāstā amātyakoṭyo rājānamevamāhuḥ /
K10bsu006_u:384: saptame divase hastirathamaśvarathaṃ sajjaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
K10bsu006_u:385: ahaṃ saptame divase jetavanaṃ nāma vihāraṃ gamiṣyāmi śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksambuddhasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya (Asv 127) /
K10bsu006_u:388: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathe avaruhya taṃ ca nandimitramahāśrāvakaṃ ratnamaye rathe avarohya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:389: atha bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān sarvaśrāvakānāmantrayata /
K10bsu006_u:391: atha te sarve mahāśrāvakā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannā abhūvan /
K10bsu006_u:392: atha rājā dūratastaṃ jvālāmālaṃ dṛṣṭvā nandimitramahāśrāvakamevamāha /
K10bsu006_u:395: atra śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhaḥ sthitiṃ dhriyate yāpayati dharmaṃ ca deśayati /
K10bsu006_u:396: te ca bodhisattvā jvālāmālaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannāḥ /
K10bsu006_u:397: atha rājā ajitaseno hastirathādavatīrya pādābhyāṃ putrasahasreṇa sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:398: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇena kāyena vyāmaprabhayā caṅkramate sma /
K10bsu006_u:399: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavato rūpavarṇaliṅgasaṃsthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrcchitvā dharaṇitale nipatitaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:400: atha bhagavān suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya taṃ rājānamutthāpayati sma /
K10bsu006_u:401: uttiṣṭha mahārāja kasyārthe prapatitaḥ / rājā āha / (Asv 128)
K10bsu006_u:403: na me kadācidiha dṛṣṭarūpaṃ tvaṃ lokanātho varadakṣiṇīyo //
K10bsu006_u:405: dvātṛṃśatā lakṣaṇadhāriṇaṃ mune nāsau kadācidvrajate apāyabhūmim /
K10bsu006_u:406: yo lokanāthasya hi rūpu paśye tvaṃ lokanāthā śirasā namasyāmī //
K10bsu006_u:409: atha bhagavān tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:410: alabdhalābhā ye tatra mama śāsanaṃ vaistārikaṃ bhavati /
K10bsu006_u:412: gaccha tvaṃ mahārāja svagṛhe saptame divase āgamiṣyāmi /
K10bsu006_u:413: atha rājā ajitasenastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣuṃ purataḥsthāpya svagṛhaṃ gatvā sarvānamātyānāmantrayate sma /
K10bsu006_u:414: sarvairgrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ gṛhe gṛhe dhvajānyucchrāpitavyāni gṛhe gṛhe ratnamayāni (Asv 129)
K10bsu006_u:417: sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadaiḥ pathaṃ śodhitaṃ dhvajānyucchrāpitāni ratnamayāni kumbhāni paripūritāni /
K10bsu006_u:418: yatra rājā ajitasenaḥ prativasati tatra dvādaśakoṭyo dhvajānāmucchrāpitā dvādaśakoṭyo ratnamayānāṃ kumbhānāṃ paripūritāḥ /
K10bsu006_u:421: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ puṣpapiṭakaṃ gṛhītvā kalyāṇamitraṃ purataḥsthāpya bhagavantaṃ puṣpairavakiran bhagavantamevamāha /
K10bsu006_u:425: atha bhagavān siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇo rājño 'jitasenasya dharmān deśitavān /
K10bsu006_u:426: atha rājñā ajitasenena prabhūtenāhāreṇa khādanīyena bhojanīyena santarpitaḥ /
K10bsu006_u:427: atha rājā ajitaseno jyeṣṭhakaṃ rājakumāraṃ dadāti /
K10bsu006_u:436: mā vilamba kurute tāta mā khedaṃ kiñci yāsyasi /
K10bsu006_u:437: aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna darśanaṃ aho sulabdhaṃ sugatāna lābham //
K10bsu006_u:438: aho sulabdhaṃ paramaṃ hi lābhaṃ pravrajyalābhaṃ sugatena varṇitam /
K10bsu006_u:439: saṃsāramokṣo sugatena varṇitaṃ pravrajya śīghraṃ ma vilamba tāta //
K10bsu006_u:441: sudurlabhaṃ labdha manuṣyalābhaṃ sudurlabhaṃ darśanu nāyakānām /
K10bsu006_u:442: śīghaṃ ca pravrajya mayā hi labdhaṃ prāptaṃ mayā uttamamagrabodhim /
K10bsu006_u:443: śrutvā na rājā tada putravākyaṃ sa pravrajī śāsani nāyakasya //
K10bsu006_u:444: atha rājakumāro 'ntarīkṣagato gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:445: atha rājā ajitasenaḥ putrasya vākyaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra (Asv 131)
K10bsu006_u:446: āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantamuddiśya vihāraṃ kārayati sma /
K10bsu006_u:449: atha rājā ajitaseno bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:452: bhagavān rājānamajitasenaṃ pravrājya yena jetavanaṃ vihārastena gamanamārabdhavān /
K10bsu006_u:454: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno rājyaṃ parityajya vihāraṃ kārayitvā bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:458: ayaṃ rājā ajitaseno mama śāsane pravrajito bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu006_u:460: 'rhan samyak sambuddho loke bhaviṣyati vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
K10bsu006_u:461: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K10bsu006_u:466: (Asv 132) ayamānanda nandimitramahāśrāvakastatraiva kālasamaye nandiprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddho loke bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu006_u:468: kīdṛśaṃ bhagavan teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu006_u:470: aparimitaguṇasañcayā nāma sā buddhakṣetraṃ bhaviṣyati yatreme tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu006_u:472: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye samprakāśayiṣyati tasya kīdṛśaḥ puṇyaskandho bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu006_u:474: yadā mayānanda duṣkarakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi caritvā bodhirabhisambuddhā tadā te sattvā bodhimabhisambhotsyante /
K10bsu006_u:475: ya etaddharmaparyāyāt catuṣpadikāmapi gāthāṃ śroṣyanti avaivartikāśca te sattvā bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau /
K10bsu006_u:477: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dharmabhāṇakāḥ samprakāśayiṣyanti teṣāṃ kīdṛśaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ bhaviṣyati /
K10bsu006_u:479: śṛṇu ānanda rājā bhaviṣyati cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ /
K10bsu006_u:480: ya imaṃ dhamaparyāyaṃ sakalaṃ samāptaṃ samprakāśayiṣyanti muktāśca bhaviṣyanti jātijarāvyādhiparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimuktā bhaviṣyanti /
K10bsu006_u:482: ye paścime kāle paścime samaye sattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti teṣāṃ kā gatirbhaviṣyati kaḥ parāyaṇam /
K10bsu006_u:492: raurave mahānarake hāhahe mahānarake avīcau mahānarake tiryagyonau yamaloke ca pretaviṣaye bahūni kalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhamanubhavitavyam /
K10bsu006_u:496: mā bhoḥ kulaputrā bhoḥ kvacit saddharmaṃ pratikṣepaṣyatha /
K10bsu006_u:499: kena hetunā bhagavan saddharmaḥ pratikṣipto bhavati /
K10bsu006_u:501: ye sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye eteṣāṃ sūtrānudhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmākrośiṣyanti
K10bsu006_u:502: paribhāṣiṣyante kutsayiṣyanti paṃsayiṣyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya duṣṭacittamutpādayiṣyanti
K10bsu006_u:506: trisāhasramahāsāhasryāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāmakṣīṇyutpāṭayet ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandho bhavet /
K10bsu006_u:507: evameva ya eteṣāṃ sūtradhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ duṣṭacittaprekṣitā ayaṃ tato bahutaramapuṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyate /
K10bsu006_u:510: na came īdṛśaṃ sūtraṃ śrutapūrvaṃ kadācana //
K10bsu006_u:512: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśiṣye dhārayiṣye imaṃ nayam //
K10bsu006_u:516: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavato gāthā bhāṣitvā tūṣṇīṃ sthito 'bhūt /
K10bsu006_u:519: subhāṣitaṃ sūtra mahānubhāvagaṃ gambhīradharmaṃ nipuṇaṃ sudurdṛśam // (Asv 135)
K10bsu006_u:520: prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ niruttaraṃ mā paścakāle parinirvṛte jite /
K10bsu006_u:523: namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāva prakāśitaṃ sutramidaṃ niruttaram /
K10bsu006_u:524: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyakā likhiṣyati sūtrametaṃ niruttaram //
K10bsu006_u:525: na cāpi so gacchati durgatībhayaṃ svargaṃ ca so gacchati kṣiprametat //
K10bsu006_u:529: ahaṃ hi paścime kāle nirvṛte tvayi nāyake /
K10bsu006_u:533: namo 'stu te buddha mahānubhāvā prakāśitaṃ sūtramidaṃ tvayā śubham / (Asv 136)
K10bsu006_u:534: parinirvṛtasya tava lokanāyaka rakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi ha sūtraratne //
K10bsu006_u:536: aho suramyaṃ varasūtraratnaṃ prakāśitam īdṛśa paścakāle /
K10bsu006_u:538: sugatāna vai lokavināyakānāṃ ahaṃ hi dhāriṣyam sūtraratnam /
K10bsu006_u:542: deyadharmoyaṃ bālosiṃhena sārdha bhāryājājatitrana sārdhaṃ mātāpitroḥ paramaduṣkartroḥ sārdhaṃ kṣīṇīena akhiloṭiena diśoṭajāja maṅgali.......
K10bsu006_u:543: utrayannagarvidoṭiena vaṭrari-khuśoṭi-khūśogoṭiena sārdhaṃ sarvasattvaiḥ sarva...... bhiryatra puṇya tadbha......
